TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted: They give you the rotors for free but make hinges and servos expensive, pay for, downloadable content.

I wish that there were windows 8.1 drivers for the latest motherboards, and graphics cards.

Granted. Only 8.1-compatible hardware is now available.

I wish Menuet OS was everywhere.

Ninja'd.

Granted, this OS no one has heard dominated library computers and other public computers. That is all. Doesn't seem too bad, this is the best I can make after being ninja'd

I wish for my cat to have a good sleep

Edited January 11, 2022 by Kerbal Productions

Sure. We put it to sleep forever.

I wish that my kopernicus planet would work.

Granted. You start using the heliocentric system.

6 hours ago, Kerbal Productions said:

this OS no one has heard

No one?!
It's a known masterpiece. GUI, internet, other things - still on 1.44" diskette, just 1 MB.

I wish everyone knew more about it.

Granted, everyone but the people on the poverty line don't know it. They definitely don't.

I wish to have a high reputation

Granted, i liked your post. Does that help?

I wish for my wish not to be corrupted.

Granted, your wish was not corrupted, however your hard drive was.

I wish for my brother to seriously forgive me after thinking he was laughing at me.

Granted.  Your brother forgives you.  Seriously.  No, I'm not joking.  Stop laughing.  He did, honestly.  Whatever, dude.  Fine, don't believe me.

I wish for a dish.  A dish of fish.  Yes, a dish of fish is for what I wish.

Granted but that jerk dr. Seuss steals it

Spoiler

Yes, I know that dr Seuss is dead

I wish that a wish will automatically wish

Edited January 13, 2022 by SSTO Crasher

Granted. Automated Wish Maker-3000 wishes that the ghost of Dr. Suess will haunt you for eternity.

I wish that there was a service that can deal with wanton spirits such like that, where such service who will go unsued.

Edited January 13, 2022 by Exploro

Granted. But I don’t know what that means, so your head explodes.

I wish for Dr. Seuss to be known as Dr. Sus.

Edited January 13, 2022 by Admiral Fluffy

Granted, everyone... pulverizes him to dust

I wish for my profile picture to be anymore clearer

Granted. You look at your profile picture and it is now completely transparent.

Now I wish that the content of my textbooks were clear; in the proverbial sense, in their content.

Edited January 14, 2022 by Exploro

Granted, it's full of pictures only the well-educated, I mean experts understand.

I wish to go interstellar again

Granted. A crashing noise surrounds you and suddenly you are stuck to ball composed by an astonishing assortment of objects being rolled around by a tiny alien. Upon finishing his work in building up this heap every bigger, he presents it to his father, The King of Kings, who turns it and you, into a star, to wander the galaxy forever.

I wish to receive for tomorrow's breakfast, a crispy egg and bacon sandwich.

 

Edited January 14, 2022 by Exploro

Granted. Its all burnt.

I wish to be able to go to sleep easily.

Granted. You surrender off to sleep, and dream of a world....of monsters.

I wish for bitter spread to go with my to be charred sandwich.

Granted. You have incidentally spread the bitter sauce across the kitchen amd have to clean it. The sandwich follows it because you've dropped it when falling on the slippery floor.

I wish to good the morning.

Granted, you also bad the evening, and don't forget the afternoon, and the noon, and the midnight

I wish for this thread to be funnier, it's funny but I want it next level

Granted, it's soo funny that it went off-topic and then it gets locked.

I wish a dozens of N1s.

Edited January 14, 2022 by BlackMesaSurvivor

Granted, but they all get to space. Where’s the fun in that?

i wish for the next person to wish

Granted.
I wish to unsee this scary shine of the Kerbal eyes in the darkness of space...

Granted. Your brain ceases to receive signals from your optic nerves. But at least you no longer see the aforementioned image.

I wish to know more about that image.

Granted, you regret it a second later, block @SSTO Crasher and hide from the Sun for 3 months.

I wish to do the laundry
